name: Advocacy & Activism
description: Engaging the public discourse directly on one or more issues.

name: Art
description: Creation of artistic works (including visual, literary, videographic etc).

name: Business & Consulting
description: Running a paid business or working with clients as a consultant

name: Events & Retreats
description: Running public events or residential retreats.

name: Media & Publishing
description: Media platforms and production i.e. curating and/or producing content. Media & publishing (producing podcasts, videos, blogs, online/print publications).

name: Network & Community
description: Operating and sustaining a network or communitty of aligned actors.

name: Research & Policy
description: Knowledge production and thought leadership. Think-tanks

name: Spaces & Infrastructure
description:
Creating spaces and infrastructure to enable and support conscious collectives and community.

* Physical spaces: Co-living, Co-working, Sangha/retreats. Includes community building around that.
* Infrastructure & support. Software (e.g. for non-hierarchical, flexible organisations)
* Online spaces: Forums, Online communities (e.g. facebook groups)
